name: Very Satisfying ASMR Honeycomb
description: Need relaxation and diversion from the stressful daily life routine? Enjoy this third simple relaxing and endless oddly satisfying game with a new series of ASMR super relaxing activities that will relax you in this antistress app, experience peace like anything. Enjoy new fun antistress relaxation toys in this amazing relaxing game that proves to be a meditation for your brain. Calm your nerves with new super cool activities including flower plucking, balls carving, color ball spreading, magnet ball patterns with a smooth drawing experience, beach sand writing and so much more that will calm and relax you. Enjoy this one touch experience with beautiful ASMR sounds and physics based toys and relax yourself now!
